If you now repent of your sin, if any of you can see that in any instance you have walked contrary to the light given you of God and have neglected to give honor to the body, the temple of God, but by wrong habits have degraded the body which is Christ's property, make confession of these things to God. Unless you are wrought upon by the Holy Spirit in 


                                                    777 

special manner to confess your sins of private nature to man, do not breathe them to any soul.--Our Camp Meetings, pp 44, 45, 1892. (CH 373, 374.)
